alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:12AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Owsley, southeastern Estill, northwestern Perry, northeastern Jackson, southwestern Breathitt and Lee Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 611 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Old Orchard, or 9 miles west of Beattyville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinnacle around 615 AM EDT. Cressmont, Heidelberg, Yellow Rock, Banford, Delvinta, Earnestville, Willow Shoals, Wild Dog, Old Landing and Whynot around 620 AM EDT. Caryton, Ida May, Belle Point, Vincent, Mount Olive and Travellers Rest around 625 AM EDT. Beattyville, Corgleton, Pebworth, White Ash, Proctor, Levi, Scoville and Endee around 630 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Booneville, Lower Buffalo, Enoch, Maloney, Turin, Major, Grass, Stay, St. Helens, Chestnut Gap, Eversole, Airedale, Primrose, Southfork, Lone, Lerose, Athol, Tallega, Jetts Creek, Copebranch, Canyon Falls, Monica, Oakdale and Guerrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Perry
